hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that a #tent in the valley# covers a #Great Fairy Fountain#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

Ganons Castle Spirit Trial Invisible Chest
